verses.text: \w Now|strong="G3767"\w* \w when|strong="G3767"\w* \w Festus|strong="G5347"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w come|strong="G0305"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w province|strong="G1885"\w*, \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*, \w he|strong="G3767"\w* \w went|strong="G0305"\w* \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Caesarea|strong="G2542"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w chief|strong="G0749"\w* \w priests|strong="G0749"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* principal \w men|strong="G4413"\w* \w of|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, went unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* besought \w him|strong="G0846"\w*,

\w Requesting|strong="G0154"\w* favour \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w that|strong="G3704"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w would|strong="G0846"\w* command \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* be \w brought|strong="G3343"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*, laying wait \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w kill|strong="G0337"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w way|strong="G3598"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Festus|strong="G5347"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w*: \w That|strong="G3767"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w kept|strong="G5083"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Caesarea|strong="G2542"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w that|strong="G3767"\w* \w he|strong="G1161"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w would|strong="G3195"\w* very \w shortly|strong="G5034"\w* depart thither.

\w Let|strong="G1510"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w*, saith \w he|strong="G0846"\w*, \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w that|strong="G0846"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w able|strong="G1415"\w*, \w go|strong="G4782"\w* down \w with|strong="G1722"\w* me, \w and|strong="G0435"\w* \w accuse|strong="G2723"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w there|strong="G1510"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* crime \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w man|strong="G0435"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w having|strong="G2228"\w* tarried \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w more|strong="G4183"\w* \w than|strong="G2228"\w* \w eight|strong="G3638"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w ten|strong="G1176"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*, \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w went|strong="G2597"\w* \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Caesarea|strong="G2542"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w next|strong="G1887"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w sat|strong="G2523"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w judgment|strong="G0968"\w* \w seat|strong="G0968"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w commanded|strong="G2753"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w be|strong="G2228"\w* \w brought|strong="G0071"\w*.

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* being \w brought|strong="G2597"\w*, \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w stood|strong="G4026"\w* \w about|strong="G3588"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w were|strong="G2453"\w* \w come|strong="G2597"\w* \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*, objecting \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* grievous causes, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w could|strong="G2480"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w prove|strong="G0584"\w*;

\w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* making answer \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w himself|strong="G1519"\w*: \w Neither|strong="G3777"\w* \w against|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w of|strong="G3551"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3777"\w* \w against|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w temple|strong="G2411"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3777"\w* \w against|strong="G1519"\w* \w Caesar|strong="G2541"\w*, \w have|strong="G3748"\w* \w I|strong="G3754"\w* offended \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* thing.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Festus|strong="G5347"\w*, \w willing|strong="G2309"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* shew \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w a|strong="G3004"\w* pleasure, \w answering|strong="G0611"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w said|strong="G3004"\w*: Wilt thou \w go|strong="G0305"\w* \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w* \w be|strong="G3778"\w* \w judged|strong="G2919"\w* \w of|strong="G5485"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w before|strong="G1909"\w* \w me|strong="G3004"\w*?

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*: \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w stand|strong="G2476"\w* \w at|strong="G1909"\w* \w Caesar’s|strong="G2541"\w* \w judgment|strong="G0968"\w* \w seat|strong="G0968"\w*, \w where|strong="G3757"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w ought|strong="G1163"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w judged|strong="G2919"\w*. \w To|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G1510"\w* \w done|strong="G0091"\w* \w no|strong="G3762"\w* injury, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* thou \w very|strong="G2532"\w* \w well|strong="G2532"\w* knowest.

\w For|strong="G0599"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G1510"\w* injured \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w or|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G1510"\w* \w committed|strong="G4238"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w thing|strong="G3778"\w* \w worthy|strong="G0514"\w* \w of|strong="G5100"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w refuse|strong="G3868"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w to|strong="G1410"\w* \w die|strong="G0599"\w*. \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w there|strong="G1510"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w none|strong="G3762"\w* \w of|strong="G5100"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* whereof \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w accuse|strong="G2723"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*, \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* deliver \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w to|strong="G1410"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w appeal|strong="G1941"\w* \w to|strong="G1410"\w* \w Caesar|strong="G2541"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* \w Festus|strong="G5347"\w* having \w conferred|strong="G4814"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w council|strong="G4824"\w*, \w answered|strong="G0611"\w*: Hast thou \w appealed|strong="G1941"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w Caesar|strong="G2541"\w*? \w To|strong="G1909"\w* \w Caesar|strong="G2541"\w* shalt thou \w go|strong="G4198"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w after|strong="G1161"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*, \w king|strong="G0935"\w* \w Agrippa|strong="G0067"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Bernice|strong="G0959"\w* \w came|strong="G2658"\w* down \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Caesarea|strong="G2542"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* salute \w Festus|strong="G5347"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* tarried \w there|strong="G1563"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*, \w Festus|strong="G5347"\w* \w told|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w king|strong="G0935"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*: \w A|strong="G5613"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w man|strong="G0435"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w left|strong="G2641"\w* \w prisoner|strong="G1198"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w Felix|strong="G5344"\w*.

\w About|strong="G4012"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w*, \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w was|strong="G3739"\w* \w at|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*, \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w chief|strong="G0749"\w* \w priests|strong="G0749"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* ancients \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w came|strong="G1096"\w* unto \w me|strong="G1473"\w*, desiring condemnation \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w To|strong="G4314"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G3739"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w*: \w It|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w custom|strong="G1485"\w* \w of|strong="G5100"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Romans|strong="G4514"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* condemn \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, \w before|strong="G4250"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G3739"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w accused|strong="G2723"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w his|strong="G4012"\w* \w accusers|strong="G2725"\w* \w present|strong="G2596"\w*, \w and|strong="G0611"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* liberty \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w make|strong="G2723"\w* \w his|strong="G4012"\w* \w answer|strong="G0611"\w*, \w to|strong="G4314"\w* clear himself \w of|strong="G5100"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w things|strong="G3739"\w* laid \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w his|strong="G4012"\w* \w charge|strong="G1462"\w*.

\w When|strong="G3767"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w come|strong="G4905"\w* hither, \w without|strong="G3367"\w* \w any|strong="G3367"\w* delay, \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w day|strong="G1836"\w* following, \w sitting|strong="G2523"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w judgment|strong="G0968"\w* \w seat|strong="G0968"\w*, \w I|strong="G3767"\w* \w commanded|strong="G2753"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w man|strong="G0435"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w be|strong="G3767"\w* \w brought|strong="G0071"\w*.

\w Against|strong="G4012"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w*, \w when|strong="G3739"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w accusers|strong="G2725"\w* \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* up, \w they|strong="G3739"\w* \w brought|strong="G5342"\w* \w no|strong="G3762"\w* accusation \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w things|strong="G3739"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* thought ill \w of|strong="G4012"\w*:

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w questions|strong="G2213"\w* \w of|strong="G5100"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w own|strong="G2398"\w* superstition \w against|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G5100"\w* \w one|strong="G5100"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* deceased, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* affirmed \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w alive|strong="G2198"\w*.

\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w therefore|strong="G1161"\w* \w being|strong="G0639"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w a|strong="G3004"\w* doubt \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* manner \w of|strong="G4012"\w* question, \w asked|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G4012"\w* \w whether|strong="G1487"\w* \w he|strong="G3778"\w* would \w go|strong="G4198"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w there|strong="G2546"\w* \w be|strong="G3778"\w* \w judged|strong="G2919"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* appealing \w to|strong="G1519"\w* be \w reserved|strong="G5083"\w* unto \w the|strong="G3588"\w* hearing \w of|strong="G3588"\w* Augustus, \w I|strong="G3739"\w* \w commanded|strong="G2753"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* be \w kept|strong="G5083"\w*, till \w I|strong="G3739"\w* might \w send|strong="G0375"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Caesar|strong="G2541"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Agrippa|strong="G0067"\w* \w said|strong="G5346"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w Festus|strong="G5347"\w*: \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w would|strong="G0846"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, \w myself|strong="G0846"\w*. \w Tomorrow|strong="G0839"\w*, \w said|strong="G5346"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w*, thou shalt \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w next|strong="G1887"\w* \w day|strong="G1887"\w*, \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w Agrippa|strong="G0067"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Bernice|strong="G0959"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w pomp|strong="G5325"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G3972"\w* \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* hall \w of|strong="G0435"\w* audience, \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* tribunes, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* principal \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \w of|strong="G0435"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, \w at|strong="G1519"\w* Festus’ commandment, \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w brought|strong="G0071"\w* forth.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Festus|strong="G5347"\w* saith: \w King|strong="G0935"\w* \w Agrippa|strong="G0067"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* ye \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w are|strong="G3956"\w* \w here|strong="G1759"\w* \w present|strong="G3778"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w us|strong="G1722"\w*, \w you|strong="G3739"\w* \w see|strong="G2334"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w man|strong="G0435"\w*, \w about|strong="G4012"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w multitude|strong="G4128"\w* \w of|strong="G0435"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* dealt \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*, requesting \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w crying|strong="G0994"\w* out \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w ought|strong="G1163"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w live|strong="G2198"\w* \w any|strong="G3956"\w* \w longer|strong="G3371"\w*.

\w Yet|strong="G1161"\w* \w have|strong="G1473"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w found|strong="G2638"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3367"\w* \w that|strong="G3778"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* hath \w committed|strong="G4238"\w* \w worthy|strong="G0514"\w* \w of|strong="G0514"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*. \w But|strong="G1161"\w* forasmuch \w as|strong="G0846"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w himself|strong="G0846"\w* hath \w appealed|strong="G1941"\w* \w to|strong="G3778"\w* Augustus, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G1473"\w* \w determined|strong="G2919"\w* \w to|strong="G3778"\w* \w send|strong="G3992"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Of|strong="G2962"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3756"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w write|strong="G1125"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w my|strong="G3739"\w* \w lord|strong="G2962"\w*. \w For|strong="G4012"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* cause \w I|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w brought|strong="G4254"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* forth \w before|strong="G1909"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w especially|strong="G3122"\w* \w before|strong="G1909"\w* thee, O \w king|strong="G0935"\w* \w Agrippa|strong="G0067"\w*, \w that|strong="G3739"\w* examination \w being|strong="G1096"\w* \w made|strong="G1096"\w*, \w I|strong="G3739"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w write|strong="G1125"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* seemeth \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* unreasonable \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w send|strong="G3992"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w prisoner|strong="G1198"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* signify \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w things|strong="G0846"\w* laid \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w charge|strong="G0156"\w*.
